java/liquibase/change/UpdateDataChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.UpdateStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00012 
00013 import java.util.*;
00014 
00015 public class UpdateDataChange extends AbstractChange {
00016 
00017     private String schemaName;
00018     private String tableName;
00019     private List<ColumnConfig> columns;
00020     private String whereClause;
00021 
00022     public UpdateDataChange() {
00023         super("update", "Update Data");
00024         columns = new ArrayList<ColumnConfig>();
00025     }
00026 
00027     public String getSchemaName() {
00028         return schemaName;
00029     }
00030 
00031     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00032         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00033     }
00034 
00035     public String getTableName() {
00036         return tableName;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00040         this.tableName = tableName;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public List<ColumnConfig> getColumns() {
00044         return columns;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public void setColumns(List<ColumnConfig> columns) {
00048         this.columns = columns;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public void addColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00052         columns.add(column);
00053     }
00054 
00055     public void removeColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00056         columns.remove(column);
00057     }
00058 
00059     public String getWhereClause() {
00060         return whereClause;
00061     }
00062 
00063     public void setWhereClause(String whereClause) {
00064         this.whereClause = whereClause;
00065     }
00066 
00067     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00068 
00069         UpdateStatement statement = new UpdateStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getTableName());
00070 
00071         for (ColumnConfig column : columns) {
00072             statement.addNewColumnValue(column.getName(), column.getValueObject());
00073         }
00074 
00075         statement.setWhereClause(whereClause);
00076 
00077         return new SqlStatement[]{
00078                 statement
00079         };
00080     }
00081 
00082     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00083         return "Data updated in " + getTableName();
00084     }
00085 
00086     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00087         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("update");
00088         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00089             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00090         }
00091 
00092         node.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00093 
00094         for (ColumnConfig col : getColumns()) {
00095             Element subNode = col.createNode(currentChangeLogFileDOM);
00096             node.appendChild(subNode);
00097         }
00098 
00099         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getWhereClause()) != null) {
00100             Element whereClause = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("where");
00101             whereClause.appendChild(currentChangeLogFileDOM.createTextNode(getWhereClause()));
00102             node.appendChild(whereClause);
00103         }
00104         return node;
00105     }
00106 
00107     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00108         Table dbObject = new Table(getTableName());
00109 
00110         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(dbObject));
00111     }
00112 
00113 }
